1.text: Check if your mangoes are ripe.

2.text: Store unripe mangoes in a dark, room temperature container.

3.text: Store ripe mangoes in the fridge so they stay retain more of their flavor.

4.text: Watch out for signs that the mangoes have turned rotten.

5.text: Cut your mangoes into cubes or slices for easier packaging.

6.text: Pack and seal Ziploc bags with your leftover mangoes.

7.text: Place your Ziploc bags in the freezer horizontally.

8.text: Eat your frozen mangoes within 6 months of placing them in the freezer.
